column4: I need help installing Xnee, I can't seem to get it working at all.
how did you try to install it ?
I'm new to Ubuntu and having a hard time installing it. You don't happen to have it installed, do you?
no,  what is the full name of the file you are trying to install ?
it's called Xnee-3.01. It's a macro program
a macro prog for what exactly ?
to record and playback mouse movements and clicks.
where did you get the file ?

ok I assume no one told you about synaptic yet,  it's a package manager for ubuntu ,  much easier to install stuff with it then anyother way,   xnee is in there I justr checked,     menu > sysetm > admin > synaptic package manager , use the search feature
I realize it's there but it's very outdated.
ok  what is the extension of the file you downloaded ?
have you ever compiled from source ?
nope, I just switched to Ubuntu. I think that's where I'm having problems.
